meanings.sent1: The little kitten let out a soft miaou.
meanings.sent2: I heard a loud miaou coming from the neighbor's yard.
meanings.sent3: The miaou of the cat woke up the whole house.
meanings.sent4: The lonely miaou echoed through the empty alley.
meanings.sent5: The sweet miaou of the tabby cat was music to my ears.

meanings.definition: To make the sound of a cat.
meanings.sent1: I tried to miaou like a cat, but it sounded funny.
meanings.sent2: The actor had to miaou convincingly in the play.
meanings.sent3: When the child miaoued during the game, everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her words miaoued softly in his ears, calming his nerves.
meanings.sent5: The wind made the trees miaou in the night, creating an eerie atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The miaou of the stray cat tugged at my heartstrings.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the miaou of the cat in distress.
meanings.sent3: The loud miaou of the cat startled the birds nearby.
meanings.sent4: The miaou of the cat outside the window was a familiar sound.
meanings.sent5: The plaintive miaou of the kitten brought tears to her eyes.
